publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2337 Mr Kenny MacAskill:Recognition of Social Workers—That the Parliament welcomes the report, Housing & Social Work: Performance Indicators 2003/2004, from Audit Scotland; recognises the positive results of the report, such as 95.5% of court reports being submitted by the due date and a 13% rise in the number of community service orders being completed, and congratulates social workers on achieving these results, despite the huge problems that persist in the recruitment and retention of staff and the obvious knock-on effect this has on the remaining staff trying to cover the caseloads of staff who have left.

S2M-2337 Mr Kenny MacAskill: Recognition of Social Workers—That the Parliament welcomes the report, Housing & Social Work: Performance Indicators 2003/2004, from Audit Scotland; recognises the positive results of the report, such as 95.5% of court reports being submitted by the due date and a 13% rise in the number of community service orders being completed, and congratulates social workers on achieving these results despite the huge problems that persist in the recruitment and retention of staff and the obvious knock-on effect this has on the remaining staff trying to cover the caseloads of staff who have left.

S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Robert Brown*, Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Shiona Baird*, Jim Mather*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Pauline McNeill*, Rob Gibson*, Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Mike Pringle*, Dr Jean Turner*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-2337 Recognition of Social Workers (lodged on 27 January 2005) Frances Curran*
